page.title: 06VANESSA'S SATURDAY (CONT)
page.content: Then we walk up the field to the yard.I get out my tackle and tack box,from the tackroom, then I go and catch her.I give her a brush over,then I put on the bridle and saddle.I get on and give her a walk around for about an hour,then I bring her in for another good rub over. While I brush her my mum mucks out the stable. After I have given her a brush,I give her a reward, then I let her go.My mum gets my tackle and we walk down the field back to the car. My mum carries tackle so I can open the gate.We put the tackle in the car,then get in and go back home. When I get home I go and play with my friend.I have my dinner at her house,and then we play.At 8.00p.m. my dad takes the dog a walk and comes to collect me. When I get back home I watch the T.V and go to bed.
